meaningMnemonic: Hit by a <radical>tsunami</radical> the <radical>drunkard</radical> is propelled down a <radical>slide</radical> where he hits the <radical>ground</radical> which is covered in <radical>fire</radical>. He is immediately <kanji>destroy</kanji>ed.
readingMnemonic: One could say this drunkard <reading>met</reading> (めつ) his fate.
